name: Bindy's Basics
description:
Portfolio Website: https://travisenglandhewlett.wordpress.com/ 

Games Jam 

Developed From: 11th – 13th September 2019 

Programmers: Travis England-Hewlett & Kye Dudley 

Visuals: Thomas Hall & Daniel Penfold

After drinking way too much of the fictional beverage ‘Tipsy Taxi’ you wake up in a recycling center, only to quickly discover that you are being pursued by a horde of carnivorous bins. Your only hope is to accumulate all of the golden trash you can find, however watch out for Froggo, his offers are fun but will leave you vulnerable.

Sourced Audio: 

Music: MacLeod, K., 2015. Meatball Parade. [online] Youtube. Available at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EeXj4EEbU84 [Accessed 12 September 2019].
